title: Paw It Forward NYC
desc: Join us for the pawty of the season on December 5th! Help out Sean Casey Animal Rescue by joining us for a 3 hour cocktail hour with open bar and entering to win raffle baskets from our amazing sponsors. That sounds like a win-win. 20% of the ticket price will go directly to Sean Casey Animal Rescue. Each ticket includes entry to event, appetizers, 3 hour open bar and 5 raffle tickets to bid on the baskets. You can purchase more raffle tickets for more chances to win at the event (100% of this purchase will be donated).? There will be 22 baskets raffled off with values ranging from $430-$60 per basket.? Check out some of our amazing sponsors!
